adviseScripts.text: Here you go!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa sets a plate of omurice in front of me and holds up the ketchup.
As much ketchup as you can muster.
Just a bit of ketchup.
I knew you'd say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa's eyes glimmer with delight.
But... are you sure that'll be enough?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa glances over with a look of disappointment.
... Fine, pour it on.
You got it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: *Squirt* *Squirt*
*Squirt* *Spuirt* *Spuuuirt... Squirrrrt*
... Phew.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: That oughta do it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I give Cocoa a thumbs up.
Master, do you prefer rainy days,
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: or sunny days?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I like rainy days.
I like sunny days.
I like rainy days as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: It also makes me happy to see Cocorella enjoying herself in the rain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I don't mind sunny days, but I like rainy days as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: It also makes me happy to see Cocorella enjoying herself in the rain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I agree to go out with Cocoa on a rainy day while bringing Cocorella along.
Soda has been super handsy lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Whenever she gives me a hug, my face gets smooshed into her chest and I can't breathe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: What can I do to keep her at bay?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Fire some ketchup at her.
Fire a gun at her.
That's a great idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'm positive I'll be able to vanquish her with ketchup.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: You can't do that. Shooting a gun is dangerous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I don't want to hurt Soda.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa and I brainstorm about how to defeat Soda.
Some customers ordered omurice today, but they ordered it to-go.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer eating inside, or going al fresco?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I prefer eating in the restaurant.
Ordering take-out and eating it elsewhere can be nice.
As expected.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Since it's you, I knew you'd prefer eating with Cocoa.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: So you enjoy al fresco dining as well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: You don't enjoy eating together with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I decide to eat omurice with Cocoa in the Maid Cafe.
Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa holds out her thumb.
Also give a thumbs up.
Shake Cocoa's hand.
Such lovely manners you have, Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Very admirable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I wasn't asking you to shake my hand...
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa and I keep our thumbs up the entire time.
Ade is always complimenting me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I want to return the favor, but how?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Tell Ade what a good job she's doing.
Give her two thumbs up.
Is that necessary?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: If she's actually doing such a good job,
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: why would I have to point it out?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: A double thumbs up?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: That's a great idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a discussion with Cocoa about how to compliment Ade.
A customer told me today that
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: it's not polite to open your umbrella in a cafe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: What's your stance on that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Opening an umbrella indoors is generally frowned upon.
If you're a maid, you can open your umbrella wherever you want.
It is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: But I'm not like everybody else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'm a maid.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: A professional one at that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: That's what I was saying.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: You know more about maids than some actual maids, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Amazing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa and I talk about what maids can and cannot do in public.
I brought a customer a menu today,
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: and they looked up at me with this solemn expression.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Why do you think that was?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: She felt inferior standing next to someone as cool as you.
She might have wanted another maid to serve her.
Am I really that cool?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I didn't know that the face people made when they encounter someone they think is cool, but now I know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Problem solved. Thank you, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: So she didn't want to meet me...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Cocoa about the customer's reaction.
Master, is there anything you don't go anywhere without?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: My umbrella.
Credits that I can use at the Maid Cafe.
An umbrella?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to carry one of those.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: When you're with me, you can just use Cocorella.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Because you want to see me every day?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: That's so nice of you to say, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Cocoa about things we won't go anywhere without.
Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I want a real challenge. Give me something to make.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I want an opulent super-duper mega ultra omurice.
I want a delectable, supremely appetizing apple juice.
Good choice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: For this one,
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'll use this brand-new ketchup I just made!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Huh? Juice?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: But I prepared some brand new ketchup...
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure you don't want omurice?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I eat the omurice, which is plastered with ketchup, that Cocoa ended up preparing for me.
Master, do you prefer ketchup or mayo?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'm crafting a new menu, and can't decide which sauce to use.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Ketchmayo.
Ketchup.
What is ketchmayo?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Is it a mix of ketchup and mayo?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I've never made that before. I know a new challenge is always risky, but I'll consider it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, you can't go wrong with ketchup.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I should have known that'd be the answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Cocoa about the new menu.
Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: What would you like me to draw using ketchup?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Draw a self-portrait.
Draw me.
Draw myself?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: To do that, I'd need a mirror, and this place doesn't have one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Can I draw you instead?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: All right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I've already drawn you many times before.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I've been practicing on my own whenever I have time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I hang out with Cocoa while she tries to draw me using ketchup.
Master, what's your favorite food?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'll make it for you right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Savory omurice.
Sweet and delicious fruit parfait.
I can do that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'll make sure it's nicely decorated with some ketchup on top too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Parfait?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I haven't made that before, but I'll give it my best shot.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'm a pro, so I'm sure it'll end up at least being edible.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Cocoa while making food.
I'm trying to increase customer satisfaction at the cafe,
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: but I feel like I keep coming up short.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: What kind of service should I include?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: There's nothing you can do. The service at Maid Cafe is already perfect.
Why don't you ask the customers what they'd like to see?
It makes me happy that you said that,
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: but unless we get our heads out of the clouds, we won't be able to improve.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Master, you're a genius.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: The customer is always right, after all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'll tell Ade and Soda.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa and I have a discussion about how to listen to customer feedback.
Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: How good of a maid do you think I am?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: You're a professional.
Hmmm...
Darn right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I'm the best of the best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Don't you consider me a professional?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a discussion with Cocoa about what it means to be a pro.
I had a conversation with Ade and Soda today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Ade likes hot cocoa and Soda likes iced cocoa.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Which do you prefer, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Warm cocoa, all day every day.
I don't care if I'm about to freeze to death, I'll only drink iced cocoa.
I also prefer it warm.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: It's even better when you add marshmallows.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Are you serious?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: How can you even taste the cocoa amongst all that ice?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Cocoa about... cocoa.
I've got the day off today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: What should we do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Do you want to go somewhere?
Nothing beats resting at home.
Sure! Where should we go?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocorella says she wants to fly paper airplanes at the amusement park.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Booorrrrring... Unfortunately, Soda and Ade are busy, so...
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Could you come with me to go fly some paper airplanes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I go fly paper airplanes with Cocoa.
Some customers have no manners at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: How should I deal with them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Teach them a lesson about manners.
Be rude right back to them.
I suppose that would be the most effective method...
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Cocorella could be my co-teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: But then I'd become a maid without manners!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: No self-respecting maid would demean herself like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Cocoa about manners.
Master, can you make origami using just a napkin?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I can.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I can do it with my eyes closed.
Can you teach me?
I should have known better. I underestimated you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: In that case, let's have an origami competition.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: We can see who is faster.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Hehehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Oh Master, you're hopeless.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: No problem though, I can teach you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Cocoa folding napkins into origami.
Master,
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I like you, Ade and Soda equally.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I like you as well, Cocoa.
Actually, I kind of prefer...
Ah ha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Great minds think alike.
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: Is there someone you like more than me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Cocoa

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Cocoa about people we like.
